title: What are good examples of moral intelligence? - Quora

response.answer_text: Moral exists as a "thing-in-itself." Moral is Moral! Existing as a "thing-in-itself, Moral cannot be other than Moral, else it is something else! Conscious awareness of Moral exists innately in human Mind Life. You exist innately having knowledge of Moral. You innately metaphysically know the difference between right and wrong! Moral innately metaphysically knows the difference between right and wrong. Earthly reality corrupts! In earthly reality situations, or, circumstances, within set groups Self-centered conscious life experiences definition of "what is moral" exists specific to any earthly human, therefore, moral, in earthly reality, exists corrupted, not existing as the "thing-in-itself___Absolute Universal Everlasting Moral. Within situations and circumstances of "what is moral," within specific set groups Moral may be arbitrarily defined as fair, just, and equal. However, what is fair, just, and equal? Fair, just and equal exists as a specific meaningfulness to the set group. The set group defines Moral to their specific earthly reality situation and circumstance. The specific set group has their owned definition of Moral; set groups definition of Moral comes to exist as the specific set groups Moral Compass. Each set group in society will own their specific definition of Moral specifically selfish to them. Business enterprises hold their specifically owned definition of Moral. Within earthly reality Moral changes definitions, no longer existing as the Absolute Universal Everlasting "thing-in-itself." Within earthly reality Moral assumes multitudes of definitions specific to the selfish need of the set group; specific to a singular earthly human ego psyche's need to define Moral selfishly specific to him Self. Ego psyche Self holds tight to his owned definition of Moral; Moral exists specific to him___in earthly reality. Within earthly reality Moral holds many definitions, yet, Moral exists as the Absolute Universal Everlasting conscience conscious awareness of the "thing-in-itself"____Moral exist Moral. You innately hold conscience conscious awareness of knowledge of right from wrong. Within earthly reality your selfish ego psyche deceives you.

"All truly wise thoughts have been thoughts already thousands of times; but to make them truly ours, we must think them over again honestly, till they take root in our personal experience." - Johann Wolfgang von Goethe (1749 - 1832), German dramatist, novelist, poet, & scientist
